site.name: LamboMoon
site.description: LamboMoon is an equihash mining pool providing stable, anonymous mining for a variety of equihash altcoins including: BTCZ, XSG, VOT, LTZ and ZEL.
site.postSyncCommand: ssh lambomoon 'cd /var/www/lambomoon-content && git reset --hard && git pull && chmod -R 755 ../lambomoon-content'
